comments.text: ï¼ˆæ¥ç¬¬ä¸ƒæ®µï¼‰ï¼š I hereby  ask for your attention and investigation on this matter and I hope whoever is in charge of designing the characters receives proper penalties.

ç¬¬å…­æ®µï¼šI have always been a Harry Potter fan since I was a kid. When the game was released, I was thrilled to participate in the Harry Potter magic world again. However, these scenes have disgusted me.
ç¬¬äº”æ®µï¼šPersonally, I feel disgusted by these scenes. It is an intentional violation against child rights. The worst part is that only female characters are showing these expressions.
ç¬¬ä¸ƒæ®µï¼šI am not sure how copyright works between this game and the original Harry Potter series. I feel like this is a big disgrace to Harry Potter itself and all the fans who love Harry Potter.

ç¬¬ä¸‰æ®µï¼šRecently I have found that in the game, all the female characters have been designed to have Ahegaoï¼ˆa facial expression which appears in porno anime when females have orgasm).
